Docs.summary: Represents the look and feel of a column in a table layout.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ColumnStyle class represents the user interface (UI) characteristics of column in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>. The styles for all the columns in such a table are collected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.ColumnStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
This simple class offers the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnStyle.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> properties for a column.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to extract a ColumnStyle from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection>.
This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> class.
